document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2002-04
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON APPROVING GENERAL PLAN AMENDMENT 2002-01 AMENDING THE GENERAL PLAN LAND USE MAP AND LAND USE ELEMENT, AND ZONING ORDINANCE AMENDMENT 2002-01, AMENDING THE ZONING MAP TO CHANGE THE DESIGNATION OF THE 14.41 ACRE PARCEL ON THE WEST SIDE OF BROADWAY TO THE NORTH OF THE SOUTHERN CITY LIMIT FROM CO - COMMERCIAL OFFICE TO OS - OPEN SPACE, AND THE ACCEPTANCE OF A NEGATIVE DECLARATION (APN 059-110-029)
